title: Everything we know so far about the Apple Silicon 27-inch iMac replacement
content:
When Apple released the Mac Studio and the Studio Display during the “Peek Performance” event, the company discontinued the 27-inch Intel iMac. With these two new products available, is there any room for a new 27-inch iMac or iMac Pro? Here’s what we know so far.

more…

The post Everything we know so far about the Apple Silicon 27-inch iMac replacement appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Rumors pointed out that Apple could launch a 27-inch iMac replacement, but since the company released the Mac Studio, this could be not the case anymore.
